CBSH02 = #{cbsh02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBSH03 = #{cbsh03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBSH04 = #{cbsh04,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBSH05 = #{cbsh05,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBSH06 = #{cbsh06,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBSH07 = #{cbsh07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CBSH08 = #{cbsh08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where CBSH01 = #{cbsh01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `CBSH` set CBSH02 = #{cbsh02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSH03 = #{cbsh03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSH04 = #{cbsh04,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH05 = #{cbsh05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH06 = #{cbsh06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH07 = #{cbsh07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBSH08 = #{cbsh08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSH09 = #{cbsh09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH10 = #{cbsh10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH11 = #{cbsh11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH12 = #{cbsh12,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBSH13 = #{cbsh13,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBSH14 = #{cbsh14,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBSH01 = #{cbsh01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select e.CALA08,d.CBPB15,d.CBPB12,d.CBPB08,b.CBSJ09,f.CBLA09,b.CBSJ11,b.CBSJ12,a.CBSH01 from CBSH a LEFT JOIN CBSJ b on a.CBSH01=b.CBSH01 LEFT JOIN gs_goods_sn c on c.sn=b.CBSJ09 left join CBPB d on c.goods_id=d.CBPB01 left join CALA e on e.CALA08=d.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBLA f on f.CBLA01=c.location_id where a.CBSH09= #{cbsh09,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.CBSH07,a.CBSH08,b.CBWA09,a.CBSH09,a.CBSH01 from CBSH a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on a.CBSH10=b.CBWA01 where a.CBSH13=0

SELECT a.CBSH07,a.CBSH08,b.CBWA09,a.CBSH09,a.CBSH01,a.CBSH09,a.CBSH01 from CBSH a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on a.CBSH10=b.CBWA01 where a.CBSH06=0 and a.CBSH13=0 and b.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%')
and a.CBSH09 like concat('%', #{cbsh09}, '%') and a.CBSH07 like concat('%', #{cbsh07}, '%') and a.cbsh08 >= #{startTime} and a.cbsh08 <=#{endTime}
and date_format(a.cbsh08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.cbsh08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.CBSH08 desc

SELECT a.CBSH07,c.CBWA09,b.CBSI03, e.CALA08, d.CBPB15,d.CBPB12,d.CBPB08,b.CBSI09,b.CBSI10,b.CBSI11,a.CBSH01
FROM CBSI b LEFT JOIN CBSH a ON a.CBSH01=b.CBSH01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c ON c.CBWA01=a.CBSH10 LEFT JOIN CBPB d ON d.CBPB01=b.CBSI08 LEFT JOIN CALA e ON e.CALA01=d.CBPB10 where a.CBSH01= #{cbsh01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
